Name: Jared P. Lander

Member of Pi Mu Epsilon, a national honorary mathematics society

Adjunct Professor of Statistics at Columbia University
Organizer of NY Open Statistical Programming Meetup
Thesis on NYC pizza published by major news sites

Advise clients on proper models, algorithms, methods and software for their business needs
Conduct R, data mining and statistics training sessions
Analyze and report on data of all sizes
Designed a lab to teach computational statististics to data science students
Taught two sections a week to students from stats, journalism, business & sociology departments
Covered basic programming, modeling, data manipulation, machine learning, visualization and communication
